page.title: 11Wallace Hall Primary School.
page.content: The school was built in 1909 and is made up of two separate buildings. The small building is for the infants and has two teachers and two classrooms. The large building has the rest of the pupils in four classrooms. There is also an art room, a spare room, a staff room and an office.Three taechers and the head_teacher work here. Art, music and P.E. teachers visit the school once weekly.There are 143 pupils in the seven classes. Children start school at five years of age and transfer to secondary at eleven .School starts at 9.15am and finishes at 3.30pm.There is a uniform of blue or grey shirt and jumper, skirt or trousers,and a blue, green and purple tie.
